labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.blizzard.com/en-us/apps/battle.net/desktop](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.blizzard.com%2Fen-us%2Fapps%2Fbattle.net%2Fdesktop) ### Comment > With AdGuard DNS filters enabled, the Battle.net app is unable to update games (like World of Warcraft) for the last few weeks. comment.body:
```suggestion
manga1001.*#%#//scriptlet("abort-current-inline-script", "document.querySelector", "_0x")
!#if (adguard_app_ios || adguard_ext_safari || adguard_ext_android_cb)
manga1001.*#@#.c-ads 
manga1001.*#@#.body-top-ads
@@||cdn.adschill.com/*/unit/*.js$domain=manga1001.*
!#endif
```

review.body:
It's fine, but I think that we still need these rules:
```adblock
!#if (adguard_app_ios || adguard_ext_safari || adguard_ext_android_cb)
manga1001.*#@#.c-ads 
manga1001.*#@#.body-top-ads
@@||cdn.adschill.com/*/unit/*.js$domain=manga1001.*
!#endif
```
for content blockers.

It's fine, but I think that we still need these rules:
```adblock
!#if (adguard_app_ios || adguard_ext_safari || adguard_ext_android_cb)
manga1001.vip#@#.c-ads 
manga1001.vip#@#.body-top-ads
@@||cdn.adschill.com/*/unit/*.js$domain=manga1001.*
!#endif
```
for content blockers.

comment.body:
Do we really need this rule (`@@||manga1001.vip^$cookie`)?
It seems that without this rule website works correctly.

Additional/Alternative solution could be something like:
```adblock
manga1001.vip#%#//scriptlet("abort-current-inline-script", "document.querySelector", "_0x")
```
or just:
```adblock
manga1001.vip#@#.c-ads 
manga1001.vip#@#.body-top-ads
```
but I guess that `$generichide` in this case is okay.

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: Cosmetic filter breaks bradesco website (on desktop)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

n/a

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome, Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

banco.bradesco

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots


commit #110526 added cosmetic filters to block banners inviting you to download an app.

But the selectors used also break the most important feature of the site on the desktop version, which is the login portion, in the removed top bar.

I suspect the `banco.bradesco#$##topBar { display: none !important; }` filter line is too generic
but the other lines added may be also causing the issue too.




### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
